ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy pack
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Experiment with the fixed batteries to develop a mobile power supply.
- Develop an energy pack. It is used to power mobile devices.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
You have developed a new battery type that can be moved as an energy pack once fully loaded.
- You can now make energy packs. - Energy pack must be linked to your power net to charge up. They will be usable once fully loaded.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Integrated circuits
ResearchProjectDef.description:
After electrocuting himself while trying to repair a short-circuited battery under rain, one of your colonist had the idea to develop an electronic protection module.
- Develop some electronic components to produce integrated electronics boards and eletronic chips.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
Your researchers have developed several basic electronic components. Combined together by a crafty man, they will form integrated circuits boards.
- You can now build an electronic workbench. - You can now make integrated circuits boards and electronic chips at the electronic workbench.
